code: import{TECH_LIST_REQUEST,TECH_LIST_SUCCESS,TECH_LIST_FAIL,CREATE_TECH_REQUEST,CREATE_TECH_SUCCESS,CREATE_TECH_FAIL}from"../constants/techConstants";export var techListReducer=function techListReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{techs:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case TECH_LIST_REQUEST:return{loading:true,techs:[]};case TECH_LIST_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,techs:action.payload};case TECH_LIST_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var createTechReducer=function createTechReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{techs:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CREATE_TECH_REQUEST:return{loading:true,techs:[]};case CREATE_TECH_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,techs:action.payload};case CREATE_TECH_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
